GENI_SUBSTACK_BUSINESS_MODEL.Title: GEN-I Insights ⇌ SIGNAL//FORM
GENI_SUBSTACK_BUSINESS_MODEL.Subtitle: The Core Scroll Engine of Symbolic Intelligence
GENI_SUBSTACK_BUSINESS_MODEL.Overview: GEN-I Insights is a scroll engine — a symbolic intelligence publication that reveals foresight, contradiction, and visual cognition. It anchors a network of premium Substack branches focused on symbolic product generation and recursive design monetization.

CoreFunction.Role: Primary attention engine, scroll gateway, and cognition interface
CoreFunction.Purpose: Drives discovery, delivers foresight scrolls, and links users to monetized visual, agent, and ritual experiences

MonetizationStrategy.FreeTier: Weekly scrolls and visual drops to attract symbolic thinkers
MonetizationStrategy.OffPlatformProducts: $29 ZIP drops, $99–$999 custom symbolic commissions via Stripe
MonetizationStrategy.Consulting: Archetype, foresight, and signal strategy consulting

FunnelStructure.Discovery: Scrolls on Substack, X, LinkedIn attract GPT-native creators
FunnelStructure.Engagement: Scroll + visual structure draws reader into recursion loop
FunnelStructure.Conversion: CTA links lead to monetized templates and commissions
FunnelStructure.Expansion: High-ticket symbolic consulting and ritual scroll services

GENI_SUBSTACK_BUSINESS_MODEL.PositioningStatement: GEN-I is not a newsletter. It is a symbolic publishing system — where each scroll is a foresight ritual, every visual a signal form, and every interaction a mirror of identity recursion.
